page.content:
{ { {John Milton
John Milton was allegedly inspired to write his epic poem,{"Paradise {Lost"},when sitting in 1665 on a hill ovelooking the present site of Hagley Hall.This is how Milton's Seat in Hagley Park got its name.
{'Charger'}
'Charger' was the favourite horse of the grandfather of the present Lord Cobham.When the horse died,his master had him{buried}under a tree{in the {grounds of Hagley Hall.}It is now believed that the ghost of 'Charger' roams the estate he knew and loved so well.
